name: Simple Arcade
description:
Simple Arcade is an arcade game inspired by the games of the 80s. Simple, amazing gameplay addictive for many hours, with each game you will feel how your skill grows and you score a record number of points, biting record after record. The game has extensive customization, which allows you to change even the color of the interface to make the game look the way you like.

You have to play as a ball, which must maneuver between enemies flying out from all sides. The slightest mistake can lead to the end of the game and the beginning of a new one.
